00025 import VetPet.Menu.MenuCommands.*;
00026 
00027 // Note: this code has been provided by Prof Craig Schock
00028 
00029 public class Menu
00030 {
00031     private MenuCommand head = null;
00032     private Console aConsole = new Console();
00033 
00034     public Menu()
00035     {
00036         
00037     }
00038     
00039     public void addMenuCommand(MenuCommand cmd)
00040     {
00041         if(head==null) head=cmd;
00042         else head.addCommand( cmd );
00043     }
00044     
00045     public void run()
00046     {
00047         String line;
00048         do
00049             {
00050                 printMenu();
00051                 line = aConsole.nextLine();
00052                 if (line == null)
00053                             break;
00054                 
00055             } while (parseCommand(line));
00056     }
00057     
00058     private boolean parseCommand(String line)
00059     {
00060         
00061         try
00062             {
00063                 return head.execute(Integer.parseInt(line), aConsole);
00064             }
00065         catch(Exception x)
00066             {
00067                 System.out.println("\nERROR: " + x.getMessage() + "\n");
00068                 aConsole.nextLine("press enter to continue");
00069                 return true;
00070             }
00071         
00072     }
00073     
00074     private void printMenu()
00075     {
00076         printMenuTitle();
00077         printMenuEntries();
00078         printPrompt();
00079     }
00080     
00081     private void printMenuTitle()
00082     {
00083         System.out.println("\n========================\n");
00084         System.out.println("Main Menu");
00085         System.out.println("\n========================\n");
00086         
00087     }
00088     
00089     private void printMenuEntries()
00090     {
00091                 int count = 1;
00092                 MenuCommand current = head;
00093                 while(current!=null)
00094                     {
00095                         System.out.println(count + ". " + current.getName());
00096                         current = current.getNext();
00097                         count++;
00098                     }
00099                 
00100         }
00101     
00102     private void printPrompt()
00103     {
00104         System.out.print("\nCommand: ");
00105         System.out.flush();
00106     }
00107 }
